name: Helmut Mayer 0003
content: Home Page of Helmut A. Mayer Helmut A. Mayer Associate Professor Department of Artificial Intelligence and Human Interfaces Background Master's Degree in Communications Engineering (Technical University Vienna, Austria, 1987) Software Engineer of Automation and Control Systems (Bernecker & Rainer, Austria, 1988 - 1993) Doctoral Degree in Natural Sciences (University of Salzburg, Austria, 1997) Habilitation in Informatics (University of Salzburg, Austria, 2004) Research ResearchGate List of Publications Research Pages Research Interests Evolutionary Computation Artificial Neural Networks Evolutionary Robotics Computational Neuroethology ANN Game Playing Industrial Applications of Computational Intelligence Member of these Work Groups Computer Vision and Machine Learning Supervision Dissertations Master's Theses (Diplomarbeiten) Project Courses (Praxis) Teaching Natural Computation) VL Natural Computation PS Natural Computation Operating Systems PS Betriebssysteme Pattern Recognition VU Pattern Recognition I + II Programming PS Einführung in die Programmierung PS Robotik Digital Devices PS Digitale Rechenanlagen Seminars Computer Sciences Workshop (Dissertantenseminar) Program SS14 Software JEvolution - Evolutionary Algorithms in Java (including API, Description, and Sample Programs) Boone - Artificial Neural Networks in Java (including API, Description, and Sample Programs) Address Helmut A. Mayer Fachbereich Computerwissenschaften Universität Salzburg Jakob-Haringer-Straße 2 A-5020 Salzburg AUSTRIA Helmut A. Mayer helmut@cosy.sbg.ac.at Last modified: May 9 2025
